instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820 3208-A,fans always at maximum speed
threads.message:
Hey, 

820 3208, when i turn on the board fans always in maximum speed. ASD testes no errors!! already replace a flat cable trackpad-board! 

No signs liquid damage! and no components damage! 

SMC ??

threads.title: 820 3208-A,fans always at maximum speed
threads.message: Inspect <TRANSISTOR>Q5660</TRANSISTOR> area for any corrosion or physical damage. For sure no liquid at any point?

threads.title: 820 3208-A,fans always at maximum speed
threads.message: yes for sure!! no corrosion points! <TRANSISTOR>Q5660</TRANSISTOR> are looks good!

threads.title: 820 3208-A,fans always at maximum speed
threads.message:
Did you try other LIO board?
Fan starts at max, or increases in 10-30s?

threads.title: 820 3208-A,fans always at maximum speed
threads.message:
Some adicional info. The macbook starts at full fan speed, but if i do an smc reset, the fans idle at normal spped, but when try to install os, it start to install but shut it self off.
The asd dont give errors when i perform the smc reset, but if not reset, it gives error related to smc.

threads.message:
